mapper.insert: insert into product_info(product_id, product_name, product_price, product_stock, product_description, product_icon, category_type) VALUES (#{productId}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productStock}, #{productDescription}, #{productIcon}, #{categoryType})
mapper.update: update product_info set product_name=#{productName}, product_price=#{productPrice}, product_stock=#{productStock}, product_description=#{productDescription}, product_icon=#{categoryType}, product_status=#{productStatus}, category_type=#{categoryType} where product_id=#{productId}
